plot: Leonidas is a high school student that hates studying and enjoys rebel life. How can he, his girlfriend and friends cope with his meddler grandma and divorced parents , who just can't help interfering in their lives?
plot_en: Leonidas is a high school student that hates studying and enjoys rebel life. How can he, his girlfriend and friends cope with his meddler grandma and divorced parents , who just can't help interfering in their lives?
plot_es: Leonidas is a high school student that hates studying and enjoys rebel life. How can he, his girlfriend and friends cope with his meddler grandma and divorced parents , who just can't help interfering in their lives?
title: Deka lepta kirigma
